00045 typedef struct {
00046         char *data;
00047         size_t size;
00048 } AData;
00049 
00050 static UProgressCallback downloadCallback_global = NULL;
00051 
00052 static size_t callback(void *ptr, size_t size, size_t nmemb, void *data);
00053 
00054 gboolean
00055 lutil_ftp_downloadToFile(const char* url, const char* downloadTo, GError **err) {
00056         CURL *curl_handle;
00057         CURLcode ret;
00058         FILE *tempFile;
00059         char errorBuffer[CURL_ERROR_SIZE];
00060         
00061         g_return_val_if_fail(err == NULL || *err == NULL, FALSE);
00062         
00063         tempFile = fopen(downloadTo, "w");
00064         if (tempFile == NULL) {
00065                 g_set_error(err, LUTIL_BASE_ERROR, LUTIL_BASE_ERROR, "Couldn't download file to specified location %s: %s", downloadTo, strerror(errno));
00066                 return FALSE;
00067         }
00068         
00069         DBUGOUT("Retrieving url %s to %s", url, downloadTo);
00070         
00071         curl_handle = curl_easy_init();
00072 
00073         curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_URL, url);
00074         curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_FILE, (void *)tempFile);
00075         curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_ERRORBUFFER, errorBuffer);
00076         curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_FAILONERROR, 1);
00077         if (downloadCallback_global != NULL) {
00078                 curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_NOPROGRESS, FALSE);
00079                 curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_PROGRESSFUNCTION, downloadCallback_global);
00080         }
00081         ret = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle);
00082 
00083         curl_easy_cleanup(curl_handle);
00084         
00085         fclose(tempFile);
00086         
00087         if (ret != 0) {
00088                 unlink(downloadTo);
00089                 g_set_error(err, LUTIL_BASE_ERROR, LUTIL_BASE_ERROR_FAILED, "Couldn't download URL %s: %s", url, errorBuffer);
00090                 return FALSE;
00091         } else {
00092                 return TRUE;
00093         }
00094 }
00095 
00096 
00097 GString *
00098 lutil_ftp_getURL(const char* url, GError **err) {
00099         AData chunk;
00100         GString *data;
00101         CURL *curl_handle;
00102         CURLcode ret;
00103         char errorBuffer[CURL_ERROR_SIZE];
00104         
00105         g_return_val_if_fail(err == NULL || *err == NULL, NULL);
00106 
00107         chunk.data = NULL;
00108         chunk.size = 0;
00109         
00110         DBUGOUT("Retrieving url: %s", url);
00111         
00112         curl_handle = curl_easy_init();
00113 
00114         curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_URL, url);
00115         curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, callback);
00116         curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_FILE, (void *)&chunk);
00117         curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_ERRORBUFFER, errorBuffer);
00118         curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_FAILONERROR, 1);
00119         
00120         /*if (downloadCallback_global != NULL) {
00121                 curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_NOPROGRESS, FALSE);
00122                 curl_easy_setopt(curl_handle, CURLOPT_PROGRESSFUNCTION, downloadCallback_global);
00123         }*/
00124         
00125         ret = curl_easy_perform(curl_handle);
00126 
00127         curl_easy_cleanup(curl_handle);
00128 
00129         if (ret != 0) {
00130                 g_free(chunk.data);
00131                 g_set_error(err, LUTIL_BASE_ERROR, LUTIL_BASE_ERROR_FAILED, "Couldn't download %s: %s", url, errorBuffer);
00132                 return NULL;
00133         } else {
00134                 data = g_string_new_len(chunk.data, chunk.size);
00135                 g_free(chunk.data);
00136                 return data;
00137         }
00138 }
00139 
00140 void
00141 lutil_ftp_setCallbackFunc(UProgressCallback callback) {
00142         downloadCallback_global = callback;
00143 }
00144 
00145 void
00146 lutil_ftp_resetCallbackFunc(void) {
00147         downloadCallback_global = NULL;
00148 }
00149 
00150 /* Non-Interface Methods */
00151 
00152 static size_t
00153 callback(void *ptr, size_t size, size_t nmemb, void *data) {
00154         int actualSize = size * nmemb;
00155         AData *file = (AData *)data;
00156         
00157         file->data = (char *) g_realloc(file->data, file->size + actualSize + 1);
00158         if (file->data != NULL) {
00159                 memcpy(&(file->data[file->size]), ptr, actualSize);
00160                 file->size += actualSize;
00161                 file->data[file->size] = '\0';
00162         }
00163         return actualSize;
00164 }
